pageContext.claim: “They've destroyed businesses. They've destroyed African-American-owned small businesses that, hopefully, they're going to come back. We're providing funding for a lot of small businesses, and hopefully we'll be able to get everybody online and get funding to be able to open up their stores and their small businesses again.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is conflating several things. Some African-American-owned businesses were destroyed in nationwide protests, but the federal government’s funding is to support businesses through the coronavirus crisis. Moreover, much of that funding did not go to African-American-owned businesses.
